alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 4:49AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Natchitoches and Sabine Parishes, southeastern Shelby and Sabine Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 448 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Hemphill, or 20 miles northwest of Toledo Bend Dam, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milam, Many, Zwolle, Hemphill, Pineland, Converse, Rosevine, Allen, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Florien, Provencal, Huxley, Noble, Fisher, Robeline, Belmont, Bronson, McElroy and Yellowpine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
